    • Class nfo.data.Profile extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      42L

      • Serialized Fields

        • profileName

          java.lang.String profileName
          Name of the profile, it should be unique (to be easily displayed by the ProfileList) but that's not necessary.

        • header

          java.lang.String header
          Banner of the file.

        • body

          java.lang.String body
          Body of the file.

        • border

          java.lang.String border
          Border of the file, the number of line is important.

        • footer

          java.lang.String footer
          Footer of the file.
